name: Repository
description: The Repository is a formidable Medium Construct with a pyramidal chest cavity that is immune to shape-altering spells and possesses impressive strength.
memorable: It has a Self-Destruct ability that allows it to explode upon defeat, posing a danger to nearby adversaries.
goals: Typically acts as a guardian or defender, challenging adventurers who encounter it.
relations: Can be associated with other constructs or magical beings.
environment: Often found in settings designed to house or protect valuable relics or knowledge.
strengths: Immune to poison and psychic damage, resistant to nonmagical physical attacks, and has abilities that grant advantage against spells.
weaknesses: Lacks defenses against certain forms of magic and might struggle against highly magical foes.
attacks: Uses two melee Slash attacks dealing significant bludgeoning damage and can unleash psychic damage with its Language Lash ability.
most_powerful_ability: The Self-Destruct ability, which damages nearby creatures upon its defeat.
additional_information: Immutable Form provides immunity to shape-altering effects.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Attacks are considered magical, bypassing most non-magical resistances.
Intelligence score allows for advanced spell interaction.
Can incapacitate foes with its Language Lash ability.
test_queries: tough magical creature with psychic attacks
